explains: n. （两边为峭壁、谷底通常有溪流的）峡谷
wordGroup: grand canyon national park （美国）大峡谷国家公园

sentences.en: The Grand Canyon never fails to impress.
sentences.cn: 大峡谷永远让人叹为观止。

sentences.en: The canyon is hemmed in by towering walls of rock.
sentences.cn: 峡谷四周环绕着高耸的岩壁。

sentences.en: Laguna Canyon Road was blocked off again northbound.
sentences.cn: 拉古纳峡谷路的北行道又被封了。
